Package gameMain

Class bully

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameMain.NPC
      • gameMain.bully

  • public class bully
extends NPC
    This class is for a type of NPC called a bully. A bully wanders around and doesn't go to class. Also, if he gains line of sight on the PC, he will chase him and try to knock him out and steal some of his money.
    See Also:
